verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7911>don't<s%> forget my <S%H8451>teaching;<s%> but let your <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5341>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments:<s%>
for <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> and <S%H7965>peace,<s%> will they add to <S%H3254>you.<s%>

<S%H2617>Don't<s%> let kindness and <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H7194>you.<s%> Bind them around your <S%H1621>neck.<s%> <S%H3789>Write<s%> them on the <S%H3871>tablet<s%> of your <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
So you will <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor,<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7922>understanding<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H120>man.<s%>
<S%H982>Trust<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with all your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H8172>don't<s%> lean on your own <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
In all your <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> <S%H734>him,<s%> and he will make your paths <S%H3474>straight.<s%>
<S%H2450>Don't<s%> be wise in your own <S%H5869>eyes.<s%> <S%H3372>Fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
It will be <S%H7500>health<s%> to your <S%H8270>body,<s%> and <S%H8250>nourishment<s%> to your <S%H6106>bones.<s%>
<S%H3513>Honor<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with your <S%H1952>substance,<s%> with the first <S%H7225>fruits<s%> of all your <S%H8393>increase:<s%>
so your <S%H618>barns<s%> will be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7647>plenty,<s%> and your <S%H3342>vats<s%> will <S%H6555>overflow<s%> with new <S%H8492>wine.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3988>don't<s%> despise <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4148>discipline,<s%> neither be <S%H6973>weary<s%> of his <S%H8433>reproof:<s%>
for whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H157>loves,<s%> he <S%H3198>reproves;<s%> even as a <S%H1>father<s%> reproves the <S%H1121>son<s%> in whom he <S%H7521>delights.<s%>
<S%H835>Happy<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> who <S%H4672>finds<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%> who <S%H6329>gets<s%> <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>
For her good <S%H5504>profit<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H5505>getting<s%> <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and her <S%H8393>return<s%> is better than fine <S%H2742>gold.<s%>
She is more <S%H3368>precious<s%> than <S%H6443>rubies.<s%> None of the things you can <S%H2656>desire<s%> are to be compared to <S%H7737>her.<s%>
<S%H753>Length<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%> is in her right <S%H3225>hand.<s%> In her left <S%H8040>hand<s%> are <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H3519>honor.<s%>
Her <S%H1870>ways<s%> are <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H5278>pleasantness.<s%> All her <S%H5410>paths<s%> are <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
She is a <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> to those who lay <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H833>her.<s%> Happy is everyone who retains <S%H8551>her.<s%>
By <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3245>founded<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%> By <S%H2451>understanding,<s%> he <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>
By his <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> the <S%H8415>depths<s%> were broken <S%H1234>up,<s%> and the <S%H7834>skies<s%> drop <S%H7491>down<s%> the <S%H2919>dew.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> let them not <S%H3868>depart<s%> from your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%> <S%H5341>Keep<s%> sound <S%H8454>wisdom<s%> and <S%H8454>discretion:<s%>
so they will be <S%H2416>life<s%> to your <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H2580>grace<s%> for your <S%H1621>neck.<s%>
Then you shall <S%H3212>walk<s%> in your <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H983>securely.<s%> Your <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H5062>won't<s%> stumble.
When you lie <S%H7901>down,<s%> you will not be <S%H6342>afraid.<s%> <S%H7901>Yes,<s%> you will lie down, and your <S%H8142>sleep<s%> will be <S%H6149>sweet.<s%>
<S%H3372>Don't<s%> be afraid of <S%H6597>sudden<s%> <S%H6343>fear,<s%> neither of the <S%H7722>desolation<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> when it <S%H935>comes:<s%>
for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will be your <S%H3689>confidence,<s%> and will <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H7272>foot<s%> from being <S%H3921>taken.<s%>
<S%H4513>Don't<s%> withhold <S%H2896>good<s%> from those to whom it is <S%H1167>due,<s%> when it is in the <S%H410>power<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to do <S%H6213>it.<s%>
<S%H559>Don't<s%> say to your <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go,<s%> and come <S%H7725>again;<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it to <S%H3426>you,<s%>" when you have it by you.
<S%H2790>Don't<s%> devise <S%H7451>evil<s%> against your <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> since he <S%H3427>dwells<s%> securely by <S%H983>you.<s%>
<S%H7378>Don't<s%> strive with a <S%H120>man<s%> without <S%H2600>cause,<s%> if he has <S%H1580>done<s%> you no <S%H7451>harm.<s%>
<S%H7065>Don't<s%> envy the man of <S%H376>violence.<s%> <S%H977>Choose<s%> none of his <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
For the <S%H3868>perverse<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> but his <S%H5475>friendship<s%> is with the <S%H3477>upright.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H3994>curse<s%> is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> but he <S%H1288>blesses<s%> the <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
Surely he <S%H3887>mocks<s%> the <S%H3887>mockers,<s%> but he <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> to the <S%H6035>humble.<s%>
The <S%H2450>wise<s%> will <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H3519>glory,<s%> but <S%H7036>shame<s%> will be the <S%H7311>promotion<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
